From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To display information about the active lines on the router, use the systat command in user EXEC or privilegedEXEC mode.

ParaDef.Info: Displays all lines, regardless of whether the lines are used or not.

Examples: The following example shows how to display the active lines:
Interface User Mode Idle Peer Address

RelatedCmds.description: Displays information about the active lines on the router.
